# 1.18.0 (2022-09-08)

### Features
- limit git list to the current directory ([d87a4c4](/d87a4c4dc20be61a7512ffce0c2f62c66203a515))
- add version fallback opt out ([3b79dce](/3b79dcec0fc8aaed9bcf2cf21470574ee5d11aa8))
- add include_scopes ([3f0aa81](/3f0aa8177e9f5f0aecbbf706b6870937eb7f249d))
- include scoped commits in the changelog ([7dbbe06](/7dbbe065267e24a8a183223db131c00d6609c21a))

### Bug fixes
- no need to limit this to path ([62434f0](/62434f01d8e590f86fcc89039a8e56de5e0bd8e7))
- remove root path ([fd8bf9e](/fd8bf9e3514b769f6cf0083fbfd4cc3cf7a8ec68))
- add config item ([f7697a0](/f7697a078ecc03afbf29ad1f6b96ce591f2a75cd))

# 1.14.1 (2021-10-05)

### Bug fixes

### Documentation
- describe how to run tests ([1e5800c](/1e5800c949a216421fcab013d63b7735887cffc8))
